lead_paragraph: Representing the Middle East “quartet” of the United States, Russia, the United Nations and the European Union, he made little progress toward a lasting peace.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Blair Says He’ll Step Down Next Month as U.N. Mideast Envoy
headline.main: Tony Blair to Resign in June as Special Middle East Envoy

snippet: Representing the Middle East “quartet” of the United States, Russia, the United Nations and the European Union, he made little progress toward a lasting peace.
abstract: Britain's former Prime Min Tony Blair informs United Nations he will resign as special Middle East envoy at end of June 2015, position he has held since 2007.
